description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Safety Engineering Expert Witness Allowed in Part in Slip and Fall Case
cases.description: A Safety Engineering Expert Witness was allowed to testify in a hotel slip and fall case despite never having worked in the food services industry.

cases.title: Electrical Engineering Expert Witness Testimony Not Allowed in House Fire Case
cases.description: An Electrical Engineering Expert Witness was not allowed to testify as he did not perform any calculations.

cases.title: Pain Management Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in Drug Distribution Litigation
cases.description: Plaintiff's Pain Management Expert Witness was allowed to testify on a physician's prescriptions of narcotics to patients.

cases.title: Law Enforcement Expert Witness Testimony Not Allowed in Carjacking Case
cases.description: A Law Enforcement Expert Witness was not allowed to testify as she was not a commercial premises security expert.
